verses.text: The \sc Lord\sc* said unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, Until I make thine enemies thy footstool.
The \sc Lord\sc* shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: Rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.
Thy people \add shall be\add* willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness From the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.
The \sc Lord\sc* hath sworn, and will not repent, Thou \add art\add* a priest for ever After the order of Melchizedek.
The Lord at thy right hand Shall strike through kings in the day of his wrath.
He shall judge among the heathen, he shall fill \add the places with\add* the dead bodies; He shall wound the heads over many countries.
He shall drink of the brook in the way: Therefore shall he lift up the head.
